images.description: A renovated cottage structure with a dark upper facade and white lower facade, situated in a forest clearing. Context: Found in the 'Our Latest Projects' section, specifically for the 'Omlazení chalupy u Tanvaldu' project. It showcases the completed exterior work. The image has decent lighting and provides a good view of the building and its improved state.

A fully renovated two-story family house with a new dark grey tile roof and light-colored facade, seen from street level with cars parked nearby. Context: Featured as a completed project, likely 'Kompletní rekonstrukce rodinného domu'. It demonstrates exterior renovation work, including roofing and facade. The image is clear and shows the house in good condition.
